description:
• A bad outfit is worse than a bad swing. Make sure you're always dressed in the best with the high-performance UA Golf Tech Polo.
  • SKU: #8795604
  • All Under Armour® Apparel features a tagless design or tear-away tag with no left-over pieces.
  • Loose fit is a generous, full cut for ultimate comfort and unrestricted mobility.
  • Moisture-wicking fabric draws perspiration away from the body and towards the surface where it can evaporate.
  • Four-way stretch allows a wider range of movement and accelerates dry time.
  • Anti-odor technology repels odor and inhibits bacterial growth to extend freshness.
  • Moisture Transport System wicks perspiration away from the body and towards the surface where it can evaporate.
  • Anti-pill finish delivers a crisp appearance and extends garment life.
  • UPF 30+ fabrication protects skin by blocking harmful Ultraviolet A & B rays (UVA/UVB).
  • UPF 30+ fabrication protects skin during outdoor activity by blocking harmful Ultraviolet A and Ultraviolet B rays (UVA and UVB).
  • Spread collar.
  • Fold-down collar.
  • Three-button placket.
  • Short sleeves.
  • UA logo at left chest and nape.
  • High-low hem with vented sides.
  • 100% polyester.
  • Machine wash, tumble dry.
  • Imported.
  • Product measurements were taken using size MD. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
  • Measurements:
    • Length: 31 1⁄2 in
